page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE by Ian
page.content: I have to get up early because my mum and dad go to work. I choose my own clothes every morning. I have to go to my friends house except on Saturday and Sunday. I come to school at 5 past 8 because I help in the nursery. Then when the bell goes we go to our classroom to have the register then we go to assembly or hymn practice. When we go back to class 7 we do some number work then we check our number work. After we do some english work. Then we go to groups with Mrs Thake. Then we have dinner. Afterwards we usually do topic work. Then we go home.When I am at home my mum has put our tea on the table. Then we put on the T.V.to watch childrens I.T.V. Then I wash up and I stay up to watch T.V. until I go to bed at half past eight.
